ing: 1/4 cup ground cinnamon, or to taste
5 cups apples - peeled, cored and chopped
des: "Simple, quick and tasty. These ingredients go together very well. Chop the apples and walnuts depending on how coarse or fine you like the texture."
ins: In a bowl, mix the honey, cinnamon, apples, grape juice, and walnuts together until thoroughly combined.
